lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.question: What group did we talk about in today’s story?
What is an example of one of the Pharisees’ extra rules?
answers: You must wash your hands and dishes in a special way
You must pray only on mountains
You must give away all your money
You must wear only white clothes

questions.question: How were the Pharisees like a cup?
answers: They looked clean on the outside, but were sinful inside

questions.question: How were the Pharisees like a white-painted tomb?
answers: They looked clean on the outside, but were sinful inside

questions.question: The Pharisees were mad that Jesus was doing what with sinners?
How was Jesus like a doctor?
answers: He came to rescue people sick with sin
He carried a medical bag everywhere

questions.question: When Jesus healed a man with a demon, what did the Pharisees say?
answers: He drives out demons by the power of the devil

questions.question: Jesus said, 'To enter God's kingdom, you must be more...' what?
What did the Pharisees plan to do to Jesus?
How many of us are actually righteous and good?
